events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company, and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your skills and experience mentioned in your resume.
A recruiter specialized in Engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact moving forward.
The initial screening interview has been successfully completed, focusing on your past engineering projects and technical knowledge.
You responded promptly to our screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm and readiness for the next steps in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 9 AM UTC, where you will tackle coding challenges and system design questions.
The technical interview was completed successfully, showcasing your problem-solving skills and proficiency in relevant technologies.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss your career goals, salary expectations, and cultural fit with the company.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback on your communication skills and alignment with our company values.
We have proposed a job offer including salary details and benefits package tailored to reflect your expertise and market standards.
You have provided feedback accepting the offer and expressing enthusiasm about joining our engineering team to contribute your skills.
You officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you as a new valuable member of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has begun, including access to training materials, system setups, and introductions to your new team.
The hiring process has been successfully completed, and all paperwork is finalized for your official start as a Software Engineer.
